ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Encapsulates functions to streamline calls from R to the REDCap API.  REDCap (Research Electronic Data CAPture) is a web application for building and managing online surveys and databases developed at Vanderbilt University.  The Application Programming Interface (API) offers an avenue to access and modify data programmatically, improving the capacity for literate and reproducible programming.

Encapsulates functions to streamline calls from R to the REDCap API.  REDCap (Research Electronic Data CAPture) is a web application for building and managing online surveys and databases developed at Vanderbilt University.  The Application Programming Interface (API) offers an avenue to access and modify data programmatically, improving the capacity for literate and reproducible programming.

name: r-redcapr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.6.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-redcapr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/REDCapR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/REDCapR/REDCapR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 151a84514011ce7b946f73349fa95e6fcd1dc28ef303f200736c412d84eeb8d7

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-checkmate >=2.0
    - r-dplyr >=1.0
    - r-httr >=1.4.0
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-magrittr >=1.5
    - r-readr >=2.0
    - r-rlang >=0.4
    - r-tibble >=2.0
    - r-tidyr >=1.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-checkmate >=2.0
    - r-dplyr >=1.0
    - r-httr >=1.4.0
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-magrittr >=1.5
    - r-readr >=2.0
    - r-rlang >=0.4
    - r-tibble >=2.0
    - r-tidyr >=1.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('REDCapR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('REDCapR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://ouhscbbmc.github.io/REDCapR/, https://github.com/OuhscBbmc/REDCapR, https://www.ouhsc.edu/bbmc/, https://project-redcap.org
  license: MIT
  summary: Encapsulates functions to streamline calls from R to the REDCap API.  REDCap (Research Electronic Data CAPture) is a web application for building and managing online surveys and databases developed at Vanderbilt University.  The Application Programming Interface (API) offers an avenue to access and modify data
    programmatically, improving the capacity for literate and reproducible programming.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
